-- | MonadLib monadic interface for the "fclabels" package.
--   
--   A MonadLib-compatible monadic interface for the <a>fclabels</a>
--   package.
@package fclabels-monadlib
@version 0.2.1

module Data.Label.MonadLib
modM :: StateM m f => (f :-> a) -> (a -> a) -> m ()
setM :: StateM m f => (f :-> a) -> a -> m ()
getM :: StateM m f => (f :-> a) -> m a
